title: Chat needs to have better context about this project
description: Currently if we wish to send messages via the chat functionality they don't know about the project or the whole setup. The prompt for the chat needs to be better and if there are any extra tools that could make the functionality better they should be added.

features.title: Implement Dynamic System Prompt for Chat
Add `get_project_summary` Chat Tool
features.description: Introduce a new chat tool named `get_project_summary` in `packages/factory-ts/src/chatTools.ts`. This tool will allow the LLM to retrieve detailed high-level information about the current project, such as its full configuration, description, and potentially relevant top-level details, beyond what's included in the initial system prompt.
